title: Bloomberg Markets: Affectiva CEO on 'Emotion AI'
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Affectiva CEO on 'Emotion AI'
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Rana El Kaliouby CEO/Co-Founder Affectiva Inc Discussing the creation and application of emotion recognition software from Pershing Insite 2017 in San Diego.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
